se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.api.base

Class BDDFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.api.base.BaseClass
      • se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.api.base.BaseTestCase
        • se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.api.base.BDDFactory

  • public class BDDFactory
extends BaseTestCase
    Abstract class to generate the tests from the stories. This class parses all the stories supplied in the parameter story in the TestNG XML an creates single testcase instances of each of them along with a webdriver for it.

    This class runs before beforeSuite, beforeClass and beforeMethod so it is necessary to initialize all the configs required to generate webdrivers here.

    TODO - Add support for multiple webdrivers
